high_descs: Walk over to the wooden desk, then turn left and walk up to the bed.
Pick up the middle pillow off of the bed.
Turn around and take a step, then turn left to face the desk.
Turn on the small lamp that is on top of the wooden desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine the middle pillow from the bed under the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Grab the green pillow on the bed that is nearest to the edge
Turn on the lamp on the table
anns.task_desc: Grab the green pillow, turn on the lamp on the table

high_descs: Walk forward towards the desk, then turn left to face the bed.
Take the pillow from the bed.
Turn right, then left to face the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the right side of the desk.
